original: Berg, Otto Vendel, kanslichef, Gö-töborg, f. 28/4/88 i Bäcke, Älvsb. 1., av Lars W. B. o. Ma B. G. 16 m. Hulda Karlsson. Barn: Ingrid Teresa f. 19. — Anst. v. SJ 16, kanslichef fr. 39. Styr :led. i Gbgs sparb.
translated: Berg, Otto Vendel, office manager, Gothenburg, born on April 28th, 1888 in Bäcke, Älvsborgs län. Son of Lars W.B. and Ma B.G. Married to Hulda Karlsson in 1916. Children: Ingrid Teresa, born in 1919. Employed by SJ (Swedish Railways) since 1916, became office manager in 1939. Board member of Gothenburg Savings Bank.
